questions.subject: Chemistry

question_value.text: What is the molarity of a solution containing 5 moles of solute in 2 liters of solution?

questions.solution: Molarity (M) = moles of solute / liters of solution = 5 moles / 2 L = 2.5 M.

questions.subject: Physics

question_value.text: A 2 kg object is moving with a velocity of 3 m/s. What is its kinetic energy?

questions.solution: Kinetic Energy (KE) = 1/2 mv² = 1/2 * 2 kg * (3 m/s)² = 9 J.
